rows.label: qst700605_msg0001
rows.name: Hey, you're back! So how'd it go?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0002
rows.name: That's roughly what happened.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0003
rows.name:
I'm sorry we couldn't have been
more help, lad.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0004
rows.name:
Nah, it's fine. It's not your fault
anyways.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0005
rows.name:
It just proves my invention needs more
work. This was just a prototype!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0006
rows.name:
But I guess it'll be a bit longer before
I can make that medicine for her...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0007
rows.name: Medicine? What now?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0008
rows.name: Waaaaaaaaiiiit!!!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0009
rows.name:
Ever so sorry, but would you mind if
I borrowed a moment of your time?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0010
rows.name: Um...sure...?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0011
rows.name:
I couldn't help but overhear the word
"invention," you see.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0012
rows.name:
Might we attribute this invention to
your esteemed persons?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0013
rows.name:
Oh, no, not us. That honor goes to
this boy here.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0014
rows.name: What's that?! This stripling built it?!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0015
rows.name: ...Who's this geezer?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0016
rows.name: An excellent question, my dear boy!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0017
rows.name:
It is I, the greatest inventor that
Iira has ever known! A man known
only as...Gennai.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0018
rows.name: Um...I wasn't asking you...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0019
rows.name:
Now, that's entirely besides the point.
Gennai has noticed your talent, young
man. Of that, you should be thankful!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0020
rows.name: He's not even listening...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0021
rows.name: What is your name, boy?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0022
rows.name: M...Marco. What about it?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0023
rows.name:
Marvellous! Well then, from this day
forth, Marco, I would like to take you
under my wing! How about that, eh?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0024
rows.name:
What, you want to teach me stuff?
Nah, thanks. I'm not interested.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0025
rows.name:
Good heavens! Are you quite sure?
Why, I can think of dozens of children
who would jump at such a chance!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0026
rows.name:
Go ask those other children then.
I don't want to.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0027
rows.name: Wait. Let me step in for a moment here.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0028
rows.name: Pardon?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0029
rows.name: Marco, look at it this way.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0030
rows.name:
Ultimately, you want to perfect your
machine, yes?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0031
rows.name:
Does it matter how you go about
doing that? Isn't what matters that
you succeed?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0032
rows.name: Ah!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0033
rows.name:
I think it would be best for you learn
the skills you need from this man, and
then bring your goal to fruition.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0034
rows.name:
That is, if you feel you can tolerate
his eccentric ramblings...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0035
rows.name:
But I think this is well within the
realms of your ability, don't you?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0036
rows.name: Yeah, yeah, I get it already!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0037
rows.name: So...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0038
rows.name: Yeah, I'll do it. I'll give a go!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0039
rows.name:
If this weirdo knows how to build
stuff, he can teach me for all he's
worth!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0040
rows.name:
I'm not gonna let one stupid little
failure get me down, nu-uh!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0041
rows.name:
That's a good lad. If only everyone
had your spirit!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0042
rows.name:
You sure about this? That was pretty
reckless, getting him fired up like that.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0043
rows.name: It'll be fine.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0044
rows.name:
He learned a valuable lesson today:
that failure paves the way to success.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0045
rows.name:
If you've risen up from the jaws of
defeat once, you can survive in almost
any environment after that.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0046
rows.name: And that's not all.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0047
rows.name: Oh?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0048
rows.name:
He also reminded me of something
I'd almost forgotten.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0049
rows.name:
That anyone, if they believe in
themselves enough, has the power
to overcome any hardship.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0050
rows.name:
When you're an adult, it's easy to lose
sight of that simple fact.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0051
rows.name: ...Is that a lesson you had to learn?

rows.label: qst700605_msg0052
rows.name: Maybe, maybe not...

rows.label: qst700605_msg0053
rows.name: Meanie.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0054
rows.name: Anyway, I think we're done here.

rows.label: qst700605_msg0055
rows.name:
Time we made a move. See you,
Marco. I'm sure we'll cross paths
again!

rows.label: qst700605_msg0056
rows.name: Yeah, buh-bye! Thanks for everything!
